description: The MSR Snow Fluke is one of the lightest available. The design uses a strong frame and decking combination that reduces the overall weight without compromising the holding power.Tough, urethane-coated nylon decking maintains surface area and holding power.Strong 7000-series aluminum frame.Corrosion-resistant galvanized steel cable.Tapered ends plunge easily into firm snow.
name: MSR Snow Fluke
